name: hotel-management-system
description: A comprehensive web application for hotel management with LangGraph multi-agent AI

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"
scripts.setup-and-start:langgraph: npm run install:all && npm run setup:langgraph && npm run start:langgraph
